verses.verse: "Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> from the <S%H6828>northern<s%> <S%H7097>extremity,<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2855>Hethlon<s%> to <S%H2574>Lebo-hamath,<s%> [as far as] Hazar-enan [at] the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> <S%H3027><s%> Hamath, <S%H1961>running<s%> from <S%H6921>east<s%> to <S%H3220>west,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> shall be the <S%H8641>allotment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7311>set<s%> <S%H7311>apart,<s%> 25000 [cubits] in <S%H7341>width,<s%> and in <S%H753>length<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side;<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it.
"The <S%H8641>allotment<s%> that you shall <S%H7311>set<s%> <S%H7311>apart<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [shall be] 25000 [cubits] in <S%H753>length,<s%> and 10000 in <S%H7341>width.<s%>

"And the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment<s%> shall be for <S%H428>these,<s%> [namely] for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%> 25000 [cubits in <S%H753>length,<s%>] toward the <S%H3220>west<s%> 10000 in <S%H7341>width,<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> 10000 in <S%H7341>width,<s%> and toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> 25000 in length; and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

"[It shall be] for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who are <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H8104>kept<s%> My <S%H4931>charge,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> did not <S%H8582>go<s%> <S%H8582>astray<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray,<s%> as the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8582>went<s%> <S%H8582>astray.<s%>

"And it shall be an <S%H8642>allotment<s%> to them from the <S%H8641>allotment<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>place,<s%> by the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

"And <S%H5980>alongside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [shall have] 25000 [cubits] in <S%H753>length<s%> and 10000 in <S%H7341>width.<s%> The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H753>length<s%> [shall be] 25000 [cubits] and the <S%H7341>width<s%> 10000.

"Moreover, they shall not <S%H4376>sell<s%> or <S%H4171>exchange<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it, or <S%H5674>alienate<s%> this <S%H7225>choice<s%> [portion] of <S%H776>land;<s%> for it is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And the <S%H3498>remainder,<s%> 5000 [cubits] in <S%H7341>width<s%> and 25000 in <S%H5921>length,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> shall be for <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H2455>use<s%> for the <S%H5892>city,<s%> for <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> and for <S%H4054>open<s%> <S%H4054>spaces;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

"And <S%H428>these<s%> [shall be] its <S%H4060>measurements:<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> 4500 [cubits,] the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> 4500 [cubits,] the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> 4500 [cubits,] and the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> 4500 [cubits.]

"And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H4054>open<s%> <S%H4054>spaces:<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> 250 [cubits,] on the <S%H5045>south<s%> 250 [cubits,] on the <S%H6921>east<s%> 250 [cubits,] and on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H250><s%> [cubits.]

"And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H5980>alongside<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment<s%> shall be 10000 [cubits] toward the east 6921, and 10000 toward the <S%H3220>west;<s%> and it shall be <S%H5980>alongside<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment.<s%> And its <S%H8393>produce<s%> shall be <S%H3899>food<s%> for the <S%H5647>workers<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
"And the <S%H5647>workers<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> it.

"The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8641>allotment<s%> [shall be] 25000 by 25000 [cubits;] you shall <S%H7311>set<s%> <S%H7311>apart<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment,<s%> a <S%H7243>square,<s%> with the <S%H272>property<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"And the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> [shall be] for the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H2088>side<s%> and on the <S%H2088>other<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment<s%> and of the <S%H272>property<s%> of the <S%H5892>city;<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the 25000 [cubits] of the <S%H8641>allotment<s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> and <S%H3220>westward<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the 25000 <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border,<s%> <S%H5980>alongside<s%> the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> [it shall be] for the <S%H5387>prince.<s%> And the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8641>allotment<s%> and the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of it.

"And <S%H4480>exclusive<s%> of the <S%H272>property<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and the <S%H272>property<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H834>[which<s%>] are in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of that which <S%H1961>belongs<s%> to the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> [everything] <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall be for the <S%H5387>prince.<s%>
"As for the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> from the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> to the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> [portion.]

"And <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> shall be from <S%H8559>Tamar<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of Meribath-kadesh, to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> [of Egypt,] to the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> by <S%H5307>lot<s%> to the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their [several] <S%H4256>portions,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
"And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8444>exits<s%> of the <S%H5892>city:<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> 4500 [cubits] by <S%H4060>measurement,<s%>

shall be the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5921>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> for the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

"And on the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> 4500 [cubits,] shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

"And on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> 4500 [cubits] by <S%H4060>measurement,<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

"On the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side,<s%> 4500 [cubits, shall be] <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8179>gates:<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

"[The <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be] 18000 [cubits] <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the city from [that] <S%H3117>day<s%> [shall be,] 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H8033>there.<s%>'"
